      • getDefaultInstanceRam

        public long getDefaultInstanceRam(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> packing)

        Returns:

      • getContainerRamHint

        public long getContainerRamHint(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> packing)
        Check if user has provided ram for some component. Use user provided ram mapping to override default ram assignment from config. Default ram assignment depends on if user has provided by uniformly sharing remaining container's requested ram between all instance. If container ram is not provided than default is set from config.
        Parameters:
        packing - packing
        Returns:
        Container ram requirement

      • getDefaultInstanceRam

        public long getDefaultInstanceRam(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> packing,
                         TopologyAPI.Topology topology,
                         long instanceRamDefaultValue,
                         long stmgrRam,
                         long containerRamRequested)
        Provide default ram for instances of component whose Ram requirement is not specified.
        Parameters:
        instanceRamDefaultValue - Default value of instance ram. If no information is specified, This value will be used.
        stmgrRam - Ram reserved for stream manager
        containerRamRequested - If Container notion is valid then pass that, -1 otherwise.
        Returns:
        default ram in bytes.

      • pack

        public PackingPlan pack(TopologyAPI.Topology topology,
               IConfig schedulerConfig)
        Description copied from interface: IPackingAlgorithm
        Called by scheduler to generate container packing. Packing algorithm output generates instance id and container id.
        Specified by:
        pack in interface IPackingAlgorithm
        Parameters:
        topology - Topology proto containing config and all spout and bolt object.
        Returns:
        PackingPlan describing the job to schedule.
